section1.title: Reinventing Security Through Innovation
section1.text: Diviniti is revolutionizing safety by combining artificial intelligence, extended reality, and advanced technologies to offer proactive and immersive protection for urban and industrial environments.

section2.title: Our Mission and Vision
section2.p1: Diviniti is an innovative company developing software solutions for the city of tomorrow. With our expertise in video surveillance, access control, and image analysis, combined with the latest advances in hardware and AI, our mission is to transform how businesses, transport infrastructures, and cities secure and manage their environments.
section2.p2: We offer a true operating system for safety, inspired by gaming interfaces to deliver an intuitive and engaging user experience. With the integration of extended reality (XR), our users can remotely interact with and immerse themselves in physical locations as if they were there.
section2.p3: Artificial intelligence at the core of our technologies enables risk prediction, real-time video stream analysis, and automated responses for proactive security management. This innovative approach, blending foresight and immersion, is designed to meet the evolving needs of complex buildings, transport systems, and smart cities by providing increased control and enhanced efficiency.
section2.p4: As pioneers of augmented safety, Diviniti is redefining industry standards and shaping a safer, smarter, and more connected future.

section4.title: A User-Centric Approach
section4.subtitle: Transforming safety into an immersive experience
section4.description: With an intuitive interface and AI-powered tools, we enable security operators to anticipate risks and respond effectively in real time.

soron.title: Diviniti - Soron
soron.metaDescription: Discover Diviniti's Soron solution, a platform for urban and industrial security hypervision.
soron.ogDescription: Discover Diviniti's Soron solution, a platform for urban and industrial security hypervision.
soron.ogKeywords: Soron, hypervision, urban security, industrial security, 3D modeling, artificial intelligence, user interface, Diviniti
soron.header1Description: SORON is the platform that allows you to monitor your entire environment. Thanks to 3D modeling and its gaming-inspired interface designed for the user, your site obeys you at the touch of a button.
soron.header2Title: A hypervisor built on three main pillars:
soron.header2List1: Custom 3D modeling of your area of interest.
soron.header2List2: Connecting your IoT management systems to our tool for real-time data centralization.
soron.header2List3: Adding our Artificial Intelligence software for optimized data reporting and decision-making.
soron.header3Title: All brought together in one tool inspired by the video game universe for intuitive navigation.
soron.section1Description: Our 3D artists create a digital twin of the environment to monitor: building, factory, stadium, station, entire city... Depending on the desired level of detail, with a focus on key points of interest. It is customized according to your needs.
soron.section2CardTitle: All sensors on a single interface
soron.section2CardDescription: Cameras, doors, intrusion detectors, smoke detectors, traffic information, public transport info, everything is easily visualizable in the interface. You can hide/show each element and navigate effortlessly through different levels of immersion.
soron.section3CardDescription: In addition to being all present on a single interface, the various sensors are easily controlled and all communicate using the same 'language'.
soron.section4Title: User at the center of the project
soron.section4CardTitle: An interface designed for the user
soron.section4CardDescription: The end user is at the heart of Soron’s design. Our software is inspired by gaming codes to be as easy to use as Sim City. We continuously conduct UX/UI research to best meet the needs of operators.
soron.section6Card1Description: Allows you to monitor key information on a fully customizable screen.
soron.section6Card2Description: Here are the upcoming train arrivals at Maisons-Laffitte station.
soron.section6Card3Description: Access to an unlimited number of sensors simultaneously (here a door and its associated camera + another camera).

atna.metaDescription: Discover ATNa, AI-powered decision support for proactive and effective security.
atna.metaKeywords: ATNa, AI, artificial intelligence, proactive security, data analysis, anomaly detection, risk anticipation
atna.mainDescription: Discover our innovative and tailored solutions for your needs.
atna.headerDescription: With ATNa, the AI integrated into Soron, we analyze massive amounts of data to detect and anticipate dangerous situations and enable immediate response.
atna.realTimeAnalysisDesc: Instant processing and interpretation of video streams, IoT sensors, and other data sources for optimal responsiveness.
atna.anomalyDetectionDesc: Automatic identification of suspicious behaviors or unusual events through advanced algorithms.
atna.riskPredictionDesc: Prediction of dangerous situations using machine learning models, helping reduce incidents before they occur.
atna.alertsDesc: Automated and contextualized alerts sent to operators, enabling rapid and targeted interventions.
atna.efficiencyP1: Our AI integrated into cameras triggers alerts when anomalies are detected (fall, accident, theft, technical camera failure, etc.), creating a logbook.
atna.efficiencyP2: From there, the user can immediately respond to the incident by dispatching, depending on the anomaly detected, a team of:
atna.efficiencyP3: Our AI aims to bring up the most relevant information and suggest appropriate response options to optimize your decision-making.

headerRaven.title: Be everywhere at once with XR
headerRaven.text: RAVEN enables operators to both supervise the entire environment and project themselves into the field at any time. On-site agents can also interact with sensors without...

section1.title: Total immersion at your fingertips!
section1.text: RAVEN makes it easy to navigate remotely to any location within the monitored environment. From a bird’s-eye view or in full immersion—from the security office, from home, or from across the globe—you can interact with all sensors as if you could touch them.

section2.title: Control your sensors and improve on-site communication
section2.text: On the field, RAVEN lets you operate all surrounding sensors—replay camera video streams, unlock doors with a snap, and receive visual instructions for more effective communication.

rse.title: Our commitment to a sustainable future
rse.intro1: At Diviniti, we believe a successful business must also lead by example in ethics and environmental responsibility. That’s why Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) is a key pillar of our strategy.
rse.intro2: Our approach is one of continuous improvement, driven by the positive impact we aim to have on the environment, our team, and society as a whole.
rse.environmentIntro: We believe every action counts. That’s why we’ve implemented practical steps to reduce our ecological footprint both in daily operations and long-term planning.

waste.title: Waste Reduction
waste.point2: Introduction of a bean-to-cup coffee machine to reduce polluting capsule waste.
waste.point3: Encouragement of reusable mugs and cups for employees.
waste.point4: Active recycling: separate bins are provided for plastic, cardboard, glass, etc.

plastic.title: Reducing Plastic Consumption
plastic.point1: Installation of a water filtration station connected to the municipal supply.
plastic.point2: No more plastic bottles: all employees have reusable bottles or containers.

mobility.title: Responsible Mobility
mobility.point1: Gradual transition to a 100% electric vehicle fleet.
mobility.point2: Tracking of CO₂ emissions avoided to quantify our positive environmental impact.

rse.socialIntro: People are at the heart of our business. A healthy, inclusive, and inspiring work environment is essential to collective performance.

wellbeing.title: Workplace Well-being
wellbeing.point2: Flexible hours and remote work options.
wellbeing.point3: Continuous training opportunities for career growth.

inclusion.title: Diversity and Inclusion
inclusion.point1: Skills-based recruitment and equal opportunity policies.
inclusion.point2: Internal awareness programs on unconscious bias and discrimination.

rse.commitmentText: We understand CSR is not an endpoint, but a journey. That’s why we keep identifying new ways to improve and reduce our footprint while acting more responsibly.
